import { map } from 'lodash' import React from 'react'; import { Table, Dropdown } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import moment from "moment"; import "moment/locale/es"; import { IDA_VUELTA, RECORRIDO } from "../../."; import { useGrade } from '../../../../hooks'; export function TableAttendance(props) { const {attendances} = props; const { getGrades, grades } = useGrade(); return ( <>
Fecha Recorrido Ida/Vuelta {map(attendances, (attendance, index)=>( {moment(attendance.date).format("DD/MM/YYYY")} {attendance.idRoute} {attendance.roundTrip} ))}
) }
